metadata.title: CVE-2019-5057 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: An exploitable code execution vulnerability exists in the PCXimage-rendering functionality of SDL2_image 2.0.4. A specially crafted PCXimage can cause a heap overflow, resulting in code execution. An attackercan display a specially crafted image to trigger this vulnerability.

criterions.comment: libsdl2-image package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
